topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393c149636872154bd90100#post_5393c149636872154bd90100
[bq="HJSDGCE"]Because come on, every time traveling movie has those "You changed the past, now you must fix it or face the consequences of your actions!".[/bq]
_I'm not going to spoil anything_, but you really really really _REEEEALLY_ need to watch "Edge of Tomorrow".  [spoiler]Because it opened up an entire new way of envisioning time travel for meWHOOPS I SAID I WOULDN'T SPOIL MY BAD WHY DID YOU HOVER OVER THIS DAMMIT[/spoiler]

But if I could change one point in the past, it'd be at any point where time travel may have become a reality, and change it so that it _does_ become a reality, so I'd be in a timeline where timetravel is totes possible and _get back to my original timeline where everything wasn't messed up with time travel and getting sent back in time for no reason guuuhhh_

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5393ca47636872171c1a0400#post_5393ca47636872171c1a0400
Ooooh, dang.  Tough call, man.  I don't buy any of the merch so I sadly can't give you a yes or no on whether you should buy it or not.  I guess if you want it in the slightest, don't feel bad about making the purchase.  But if you don't really want it, don't feel bad about not buying it either.
Trust your feelings, for you know them to be true!
~^I'm sorry^~

[bq="HJSDGCE"]I'm in front of a toy store and every time I see a pony collectible, I scream "Damn it!", so now I'm in a dilemma.

Should I buy it or not? [/bq]
You sir, are just like me. Though, I'm not normally a spender. I've committed myself to buy certain Pony merchandises that catches me, and not just any Pony merch. Heck, I even contemplated on fasting for a time just to save up.
